answers.answer: I have one in 8 days due to complications. My baby is breech, I also have severe preeclampsia and gestational diabetes. Its my first c section, ive always delivered vaginally so im very nervous and ill only be 37 weeks. There is a large number of reasons as to why you may have to have one, but id try not to dwell on it to much unless your dr has said something. I hooe everything goes smoothly for you and you get the delivery you hope for!

question: I'm a ftm and I'm 36 week's today.  As my dd gets closer I get more nervous about what can go wrong.  What are some reasons or complications that could arise that would cause me to need a c-section?
title: Ftm what are some reasons a c-section would be required
